faqs.question: What features are available in the Quick Access panel?
faqs.answer:
The Quick Access Panel has several options for common tasks:

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wiki/300861911-df4cbb6c-2786-4f50-92c3-5b6b89475656.png[/image]

Version Compatibility
The panel displays important warnings about Blender version compatibility:
• Notifications for older Blender versions (below 4.2)
• Warnings for newer versions (above 4.3)
• Alpha version notifications

Under normal circumstances you should not see this notifcation.

### Import/Export Model
- Imports models with optimal settings
- Supported import types:
  - MMD: .pmx/.pmd
  - XNALara: .xps/.mesh/.ascii
  - Source: .smd/.qc/.vta/.dmx
  - VRM: .vrm
  - FBX: .fbx
  - DAE: .dae
  - ZIP: .zip

### Export options:
- FBX for Unity
- Resonite (GLTF format)

### Other Quick Features:
- Join all meshes
- Combine Materials
- Start Pose Mode
- Pose to Shape Key
- Apply as Rest Pose

**Pose Mode Controls**
• Start Pose Mode: Enter pose mode with or without resetting the pose
• Stop Pose Mode: Exit pose mode with options to keep or reset the current pose
• When in pose mode:
- Create Shape Key from Pose: Convert the current pose into a shape key
- Apply as Rest Pose: Set the current pose as the default pose
